Title: Fridge
Description: Keeps your food fresh.

Title: Chest
Description: A simple chest to store your items.

Title: Protector: Anti-Destruction
Description: Helps protecting your creation from damage. Connect it to a Battery container.

Title: Encryptor: Anti-Connection
Description: Hides the connections on your creations from other mechanics. Connect it to a Battery container.

Title: Dressbot
Description: Use the Dressbot to make new clothes for your Mechanic. Just add your garment boxes and the right amount of cotton. You can also customise your look by using the blue wardrobe.

Title: Mountable Spud Gun
Description: Connect it to a Ammo container with a trigger to shoot.

Title: Respawn Bed
Description: Take a lovely nap in this comfy bed to respawn in it after your mechanic has been knocked out.

Title: Bearing
Description: Everything you place on the bearing will revolve. Bearings can also be connected to an engine or the driver's seat to be controlled in different ways.

Title: Sport Suspension
Description: Adds bounce and stability. Great for vehicles to prevent them from easily tipping over. This suspension is small, but has a firmer bounce.

Title: Off-Road Suspension
Description: Adds bounce and stability. Great for vehicles to prevent them from easily tipping over. This suspension has a lot of bounce, making it ideal for off-road vehicles.

Title: Driver's Seat
Description: Makes bearings turn left and right. Can be connected to an engine to control the direction of travel. Can also be connected to triggers that can be activated from the seat.

Title: Seat
Description: Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the seat.

Title: Driver's Saddle
Description: Makes bearings turn left and right. Can be connected to an engine to control the direction of travel. Can also be connected to triggers that can be activated from the saddle.

Title: Saddle
Description: Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the saddle.

Title: Toilet
Description: Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the toilet. Don't forget to flush!

Title: Gas Engine
Description: An engine with fixed speed and adjustable power, ideally suited to powering vehicles. Can be connected to a driver's seat or triggers.

Title: Electric Engine
Description: Powers bearings. An engine with fixed power and adjustable speed. A slow engine with a lot of strength. Can be connected to a driver's seat or triggers.

Title: Thruster
Description: Enough of these can make things fly. Needs to be connected to a trigger or the driver's seat in order to activate.

Title: Controller
Description: Allows bearings to rotate in sequence. Perfect for building transforming creations. Needs to be connected to bearings. Activated by connecting a trigger or driver's seat to the controller.

Title: Switch
Description: Unlimited toggling on demand. The Switch activates whatever it's connected to, making it indispensible when you want to turn things on and off with a single push. It can activate an engine, a thruster, the controller and more.

Title: Button
Description: Activates stuff. The button activates as long as it remains pressed.

Title: Sensor
Description: It detects, it activates! The sensor activates when detecting any kind of surface that comes into its view, and has a reach of ten blocks. It can activate an engine, a thruster, the controller and more.

Title: Radio
Description: All hits, all the time. Those beastly bots have hijacked and are now transmitting classic selections from their deeply unusual taste in music. Activate it by interacting with it or by connecting it to a trigger.

Title: Horn
Description: Add it to your vehicle or use it as a door bell. Honk at your friends to avoid accidents. Set the pitch and connect it to a trigger to activate it.

Title: Logic Gate
Description: The Logic Gate is a powerful block that allows you to build basic logical functions. By pressing E on the block, the mechanic can choose between different logic gate types. The logic gate can be connected to other logic gates, triggers, timers and more. Great for making advanced creations.

Title: Timer
Description: The Timer allows you delay the interaction between two interactive parts. For example, between a switch and a controller. It goes great with Logic Gates.

Title: Totebot Head: Bass
Description: This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this.

Title: Totebot Head: Percussion
Description: This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this.

Title: Totebot Head: Synth Voice
Description: This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this.

Title: Totebot Head: Blip
Description: This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this.

Title: Bathtub
Description: Used for maximum relaxation. Sit down and relax or add it to your vehicle to stay nice and clean on the go. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the bathtub.

Title: Piston
Description: Extends and contracts! Connect it to a trigger to activate. The piston can also be connected to a controller to make it extend and contract in a sequence. Perfect for creating impressive creations.

Title: Raft Shark Mount
Description: A plastic shark mount prop from the survival game Raft. It seems to have some mechanical joints inside. Maybe it can bite?

Title: Mountable Spud Gun
Description: The potato shooting mountable spud gun is great for protecting your creations. Connect it to a trigger that is connected to a seat to shoot while seated.

Title: Small Explosive Canister
Description: Highly explosive canister that can detonate by strong collisions or by Spud Guns. This canister has a small explosion radius.

Title: Large Explosive Canister
Description: Highly explosive canister that can detonate by strong collisions or by Spud Guns. This canister has a large explosion radius.

Title: Challenge Chest
Description: Fill with the items you want the player to build with in your challenge.

Title: Player Start
Description: Players will start on these when playing the challenge.

Title: Ball Spawner
Description: Spawns a ball when the challenge starts. Connect to a trigger to control the spawning. A new one will spawn if the ball falls off the edge.

Title: Explosive Canister Spawner
Description: Spawns an explosive canister when the challenge starts. Connect to a trigger to control the spawning. A new one will spawn if the canister is destroyed.

Title: Goal Platform
Description: Bringing your creation over this Goal Platform wins the challenge. Connect an input to set a win condition. Connect outputs to trigger celebration events.

Title: Build Platform
Description: As long as the challenge has not started the player can build their creation here.

Title: Ball
Description: It's spherical!

Title: Ball Socket
Description: Bring a ball of matching color into the socket to activate.

Title: Big Piston
Description: A really long and powerful piston useful for moving large doors and platforms in challenges.

Title: Big Sensor
Description: Senses creations and players in front of it. 64 block range. Senses through walls.

Title: On / Off Light Block
Description: Used to communicate challenge logic to the player.

Title: Arrow Light Block
Description: Connect in a series to light up a path.

Title: Challenge Starter
Description: The Challenge Starter allows you to create challenges that does not require a creation to trigger the goal. Needs to be connected to a trigger to start the challenge.

Title: Goal Block
Description: This block will finish a challenge when triggered. It's useful if you want your challenge to end with a switch, sensor or button activation.

Title: Celebrationbot
Description: Connect to a trigger and activate to start the celebration!

Title: Confirmation Sound Cube
Description: Makes a sound when triggered.

Title: Ball Spawner Frame One
Description: A frame with an arrow that lights up when triggered.

Title: Ball Spawner Frame Two
Description: A frame with an arrow that lights up when triggered.

Title: Map Computer
Description: Gives an overview of the challenge.

Title: Observerbot
Description: Takes notes whenever the player builds something.

Title: Pop-up Audience
Description:
They love you!
Perfect for celebrating the completion of a challenge.

Title: Character Spawner
Description: The Character Spawner lets you spawn characters from Survival mode in your challenges. Connect it to a trigger or the Challenge starter to spawn the selected character.

Title: Small Goal Platform
Description: Bringing your creation over this Goal Platform wins the challenge. Connect an input to set a win condition. Connect outputs to trigger celebration events.
